name: Blazing Star Cute-O
description:
Play as Cute-O the Magical Girl Hero who fights the forces of evil using the martial art of Kyudo, Japanese archery.

This was created in 2 days for the  AlphaLab Magic Jam with the following classmates.

Design - Ian Jeannin

Programming - Sophie Kneznekoff

Art - Brittany Ellis and Ja'ire Vaughn
